snippet: The Downtown Dance Festival began on Saturday with six troupes from the city, upstate and abroad performing amid the shade in Battery Park.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews opening day dance performances kicking off the Downtown Dance Festival in Battery Park.
lead_paragraph: The Downtown Dance Festival began on Saturday with six troupes from the city, upstate and abroad performing amid the shade in Battery Park.

headline.seo: Downtown Dance Festival and Battery Dance Company
headline.main: Beneath the Dappled Light, There’s Safety and Charm in Numbers
headline.print_headline: Beneath the Dappled Light, There’s Safety and Charm in Numbers
